articles.title: No-deal Brexit would be worse for the UK economy than Covid-19, says Bank of England governor - CNN
articles.description: Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey has warned that failing to secure a new trade deal with the European Union would do more damage to the UK economy over the long run than the coronavirus pandemic.
